English: Is there a repair shop in the vicinity?
Could you call to roadside assistance for me?
Could you take me to the closest car repair shop?
Hungarian: El tudna vinni a legközelebbi autószervizbe?

English: Could I get a bit of gasoline from you?
Could you help me to change the tire?
There's a problem with my car.
There's a problem with the engine.

Finnish: Moottori sammuu heti käynnistämisen / startin jälkeen.
English: The engine dies immediately after start-up.
Hungarian: A motor azonnal leáll a beindítás után.

English: The engine's indicator light is on.
The engine's fault light is on.
The engine keeps stopping the whole time.
The engine doesn't responds to acceleration.
Hungarian: A motor nem reagál a gázadásra.

English: The left front indicator doesn't work.
Hungarian: A bal első irányjelző nem működik.

English: There's a weird sound coming from the right.
Hungarian: Furcsa hang hallatszik a jobb oldalról.

English: The oil indicator light is on.
The gearbox makes a whining sound.
You can hear wheezing underneath the hood.
Hungarian: A motorháztető alatt sípoló hang hallatszik.

English: The car rattles on a bumpy road.
Hungarian: Az autó csörög a göröngyös úton.

English: There's a problem in the brakes.
The brake pedal has to be pressed hard.
Can you fix it today already?
By what time can you fix my car?
How long do I have to wait?
Can you fix it by tomorrow?
When will my car be ready?
Could you take a look at my car?
The gear wheels are worn out.
Tire pressures have fallen too low.
Hungarian: A gumik nyomása túl alacsony lett.

English: There is a fault in the ignition.
The spark plugs are worn out.
The spark plugs are in poor condition.
The spark plug wires are damaged.
The spark plug wires are defective.
There is a problem with the injection system.
There's an air pocket in the coolant.
There's a blockage in the radiator pipes.
The coolant is leaking into the engine.
The oil pressure sensor is defective.
The sensor gives incorrect information on oil pressure.
Hungarian: Az érzékelő rossz információt ad az olajnyomásról.

English: There's not enough oil in the engine.
Hungarian: Túl kevés olaj van a motorban.

English: You're using the wrong kind of oil.
The oil sump is clogged at the bottom of the engine.
Hungarian: Az olajteknő eldugult a motor alján.

English: The oil pump can't pump the oil.
Hungarian: Az olajszivattyú nem tudja szivattyúzni az olajat.

The power steering fluid is low.

The power steering makes a whistling sound.
